item.title: BBD
item.description: score:41 Chances: Banco Bradesco’s partnership with Amazon.com for launching a credit card offering in Brazil could enhance its fintech and expansion efforts. Positive response from the chief executives of Brazil’s largest private lenders, defending the government’s planned tax reform, could indicate potential economic opportunities.
